This is Saranya from Oriontekinc, we do have a job opening for Technical Product Owner /Business System Analyst position at Remote with our client. If you have any resumes please send it to saranya@oriontekinc.com

Lead -Technical Product Owner /Business System Analyst
Duration: 6 months contract
Location: Remote
Experience: 8+ years of industry work experience

JD:
Experience in Finance/Banking industry delivering key analysis interacting with business partner and stakeholders. Must be able to write complex SQLs, generate reports and build visualizations. Experience in GCP BQ Experience in leading medium scale projects end to end
Develops, owns, and leads project roadmap
Good to have knowledge in Hadoop Ecosystem and components
Good to have accounting experience.
Works with cross-functional teams and various stakeholders, including analytics, engineering, and reporting/ business teams
Experience in managing and understanding requirements, translating them to technical docs for engineering teams.
Experience with databases, systems integration, application development and reporting
Works independently and able to make decisions quickly when necessary
Quick Learner with an ability to ramp up in technologies and modules to meet business needs
Works in an Agile environment and continuously reviews the business needs, refines priorities, outlines milestones and deliverables, and identifies opportunities and risks
Maintain, track and collaborate with dev teams to ensure project estimation for delivery
Experience using JIRA and Confluence, or similar User Story workflow and management tool is a must
Highlight the bugs and blockers and coordinate with the development and operations team to come up with the best solutions/fixes and document them
Weekly and Monthly status reporting to leadership
